div.p:
( a) Chaotic saddle existing in the frozen-in system at C = 0.33. ( b) Stable manifold of the saddle. Both objects are determined by the sprinkler method as described in
41, 42 . ( c) The saddle (yellow dots) and its stable manifold laid over the basins of attraction in the frozen-in system, with C + (Fig. 2a).
